title: NFL week 10: Colts edge Falcons in Berlin, Bucs v Patriots, Vikings v Ravens and more – live
summary: Seven NFL games are scheduled to start at 6 PM UK time. This follows the Indianapolis Colts' overtime victory against the Atlanta Falcons, secured by a touchdown from Jonathan Taylor. Fans are eagerly anticipating the upcoming matches.

title: Manchester City v Liverpool: Premier League – live
summary: Manchester City and Liverpool, both vying for the Premier League title, are set to clash at the Etihad Stadium. The match promises to be a significant event in the league. Rob Smyth will provide coverage of this high-stakes encounter.

title: Eight winter clothing essentials Scandinavians swear by – from heated socks to ‘allværsjakke’
summary: Prepare for winter with innovative accessories designed and tested by experts familiar with harsh, cold conditions. These clever items aim to enhance comfort and warmth during long, dark winter months. Stay cozy and stylish this winter season.

title: Tim Davie resigns as BBC director general after accusations of ‘serious and systemic’ bias in coverage
summary: Davie announced that his departure from the BBC was his own decision. This comes as the BBC is set to apologize for its editing of a Donald Trump speech. The timing has raised questions about the circumstances surrounding his resignation.

title: Ghislaine Maxwell reportedly ‘much happier’ after prison transfer by Trump officials
summary: Jeffrey Epstein's associate, who is currently serving a 20-year sentence for sex-trafficking crimes, has been transferred to a minimum-security federal prison in Texas. This relocation raises concerns about the conditions of his imprisonment. The change comes after significant time served for his offenses.
